room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: Very creative room and way different from a couple other places I've been. Asylum was much harder than typical escape room experiences. I loved the challenge. Be ready to think outside the box. I will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: We had an absolute blast! Celebrated our mom's birthday by challenging ourselves with the Asylum room! We were certainly impressed! What an absolute GREAT way to have some incredible fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: First time doing an escape room. We failed but had a great time doing it! I wanted to go big or go home so we did the hardest room which was Asylum, creepy is exactly how it would describe it. Thank you so much Down The Rabit whole we will definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: This was so fun. I took two 14-year-olds and we did the asylum room. We had such a great time. The gentleman who helped us was funny and helpful. My cousin and brother were so thrilled they were begging to go back the next day. We will definitely be back. 10/10 would do again

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Down the Rabbit Hole in Tucson
review: I loved this place. The Asylum was challenging but super interesting. I loved the vibe the room gave off. I definitely recommend giving this place a go and trying to solve one of the rooms.
